original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses and Aaron, This is the ordinance of the passover: There shall no stranger eat thereof:
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세와 아론에게 이르시되 유월절 규례는 이러하니라 이방 사람은 먹지 못할 것이나

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses and Aaron
This is the ordinance of the passover
There shall no stranger eat thereof
